fileToBase64

public static java.lang.String fileToBase64(java.io.File file)
                                     throws java.lang.Exception
Converts a file and encodes it as a Base64 string. Uses method found on http://stackoverflow.com/questions/1264709/ convert-inputstream-to-byte-in-java

Parameters:
file - File to be encoded.
Returns:
Base64 string version of the file.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

base64ToFile

public static java.io.File base64ToFile(java.lang.String base64File,
                                        java.lang.String fileName)
Converts a Base64 string encoded file back to a regular file and stores it in the Android external storage directory.

Parameters:
base64File - The Base64 encoded string of the file.
fileName - The filename to save the file as.
Returns:
File pointer where the file is saved.
